    • Method Detail

      • startClient

        public void startClient(String IP,
               int port,
               Cell cellStart,
               String password,
               Observer observer)
        Method that will start the client and receive cells throw network
        Parameters:
        IP - the server ip
        port - the connection port of the server
        cellStart - cell where we paste the content of the shared cells
        password - the connection password
        observer - the observer class

      • startClient

        public void startClient(Connections connection,
               Cell cellStart,
               Observer observer,
               String password)
        Method that will start the client and receive cells throw network
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the server
        cellStart - cell where we paste the content of the shared cells
        observer - the observer class
        password - the password connection

      • sendToServer

        public void sendToServer(Socket sock)
                  throws IOException,
                         InterruptedException
        Method that when changes occurred on cells of client's share, listener changes a flag value and this method can run and send that update to the server
        Parameters:
        sock - the client socket
        Throws:
        IOException - of a I/O exception occurs
        InterruptedException
